ARABIC: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This nation of yours is one nation and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily this your order is one order, and I am your Lord; so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily this community of yours is a single community, and I am your Lord; so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: People, you are one nation and I am your Lord. Worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed this religion of yours, is one religion; and I am your Lord, therefore worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, this, your Ummah is one, and I am your Lord, therefore worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely this Islam is your religion, one religion (only), and I am your Lord, therefore serve Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely this community of yours is one community, and I am your Lord; so serve Me.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This community of yours is one community and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this community of yours is a single community, and I am your Lord; so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed this community of yours is one community, and I am your Lord. So worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, this brotherhood of yours is a single brotherhood, and I am your Lord and Cherisher: therefore serve Me (and no other).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! This, your Ummah [Sharia or religion (Islamic Monotheism)] is one religion, and I am your Lord, therefore worship Me (Alone). [Tafsir Ibn Kathir]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, this nation of yours is one nation, and I am Your Lord, therefore worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This community of yours is one community, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:92] ‘Truly this, creed of Islam, is your community, your religion, O you who are being addressed — in other words, you must adhere to it as, one community, [this being] a necessary state [of affairs], and I am your Lord, so worship Me’, affirm My Oneness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! this, your religion, is one religion) a well-pleasing religion, (and I am your Lord) one Lord, (so worship Me) so obey Me.
